thread.title: Perfect place to shake off the jet lag
thread.title_full: Perfect place to shake off the jet lag - Review of The Nadler Victoria, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: lollygagme
title: Perfect place to shake off the jet lag
text: I stayed in a larger King room. The bed was very comfortable with interesting sights to peer at through the windows. The location was perfect for any traveler wanting to be in the middle of all the top London sights. Many thanks to Daniel at the front desk, who was extremely helpful honing my itinerary and making nice suggestions regarding my trip to Budapest.
